content: Took a break from coding to visit the Brooklyn Museum. Got some dope ideas for Xander's avatar from the art there. Meanwhile, Xander's learning to tweet now, so expect some posts about its progress.
Xander's been dropping solid trade suggestions lately. Had a chat with the crew about bringing Xander into our group chat for trading tips. Also, took Xander to a tech meetup - everyone loved it!
Had another rejection on the job hunt, but Xander helped me tweak my resume. Diving deeper into Xander's NFT art style development, starting a mood board. It's all about refining the vision now.
